medical_history.chief_complaint: Subacute gait decline and episodes of fecal incontinence.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms of gait decline began approximately a couple of weeks ago, with progressive difficulty initiating movements. The patient experienced 4 episodes of fecal incontinence over the past few days, with sudden urges. He once walked well but has noted a decline over the past period, and there is uncertainty regarding recent changes in leg strength.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of right AVM leading to left hemiparesis, cervical spondylosis, memory decline, sensorineural hearing loss, previous migraines, history of bradycardia, and possible chronic kidney disease.
medical_history.family_history: Father had bladder cancer; mother died during childbirth; sister has a history of colon cancer.
